attributes.action: Bring back National Service to remove the thugs off our Streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to sort out Britains Children, Teenagers. "Hoody" Gangs need to be stopped. Knife crime needs to be stopped, Law and Order needs to be stricter. National Service would not only teach our children right from wrong, but will also empty our streets of all those thugs that so many people are now scared of.

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?ha=1157&sc=number10&qt=national+service
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
